mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (name, nickname, gender, email, phone, comment) VALUES (#{name}, #{nickname}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{comment})
mapper.select: select * from user where name = #{name} and phone = #{phone}
select * from user where name = #{name} and email = #{email}

SELECT b.city_name, c.product_photo_path, a.title, substring(a.content, 1, 10) AS short_content, a.price AS product_price, a.created_at AS upload_time FROM product a LEFT JOIN city_code b ON a.city_code_id = b.id LEFT JOIN product_photos c ON a.id = c.product_id and c.thumbnail is not null WHERE a.user_id = #{userId};
